text: Where applicable, we will use any information submitted by you in the following ways: To share your information with third party contractors hired by us to perform functions and provide services to us subject to the obligations consistent with this Privacy Policy.
We may also collect your relevant payment or credit card information if you wish to pay for any services offered via the Platform.
Where applicable, we will use any information submitted by you in the following ways:
At Viva Translate, we collect personally identifiable information ("PII") and non-personally identifiable ("Non-PII") information from you.
